page.title: 05TOWN MAYOR
page.content: A group of children were invited to question the town mayor about his lifestyle in relation to his duties.Here follows a summary of the children's questions and the answers they received. You do not have to be born in Tewkesbury to become town mayor,but you must be of voting age and will be elected by the town councillors.Equally you may be elected on more than one occasion. Tewkesbury was a borough until 1974, and because of charters granted by Queen Elizabeth I,had a borough mayor. Since boundaries changes in that year Tewkesbury gained a town mayor. The mayor's official dress consists of a robe of scarlet and ermine and a gold chain of office which was presented to the borough in 1878. (cont.)
